title: Repost T206 Schirm Nice Raw sold

posts.post_title: Repost T206 Schirm Nice Raw sold
posts.post_content:
I originally posted this in the wrong category
Here is a nice t206 of Schirm. Funny name for those raised in the 60's. It looks great with very nice color and clarity. The back feels a bit rough above 350 . But hard to see in the scan or with the eye. It will grade as it does measure but I dont know what it will grade. 50.00 shipping free with delivery confirmation
sold
